actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to exempt from tax a portion of the income of individuals not employed by the Federal Government who live in a State in which Federal employees receive an allowance based on living costs and conditions of environment.

summary.text: Excludes, under the Internal Revenue Code, from the gross income of individuals not employed by the Federal Government, who live in a State in which Federal employees receive an allowance based on living costs and conditions of environment, a percentage of their income equal to the percentage of basic pay received by Federal Government employees representing such allowance.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to exempt from tax a portion of the income of individuals not employed by the Federal Government who live in a State in which Federal employees receive an allowance based on living costs and conditions of environment.
